item.title: The builders from the company Precision Contractors LTD keep blocking Hemmings Close road, 17th January
item.description:
These builders park in the middle of the road all day and block the road for Hemmings Close, even on Saturdays. It is extremely difficult to get in and out of the road with a car and even if your ask them to move their trucks and vans they refuse to do so.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Hemmings Close, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in middle of road, 17th January
item.description:
